definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)

sentences.english: A furious player kicked his racket into the grandstand.
sentences.chinese: 一位憤怒的球員將他的球拍踢向了看臺。

sentences.english: How longtime should the line be on the racket?
sentences.chinese: 羽毛球拍上線要多長時間？

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an inserted inter adsorption game ball and a ball bat.
sentences.chinese: 一種嵌插式相互吸附的遊戲球及球拍。

sentences.english: My hands blistered from holding the racket.
sentences.chinese: 我的手因握球拍而起了水皰。

sentences.english: This way both the net and her racket head protect her.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，球網和球拍給她雙重的保護。

sentences.english: You can go to the store with me to purchase pingpong bats and balls.
sentences.chinese: 我可以和你一起去買乒乓球拍和球。

sentences.english: Then can I borrow your tennis racket, since
sentences.chinese: 既然您不用網球拍，那我可以借用一下嗎？

sentences.english: I would have broken a couple of racquets .
sentences.chinese: 如果是我的話可能會摔掉好幾副球拍。

sentences.english: Now don't get distracted. We came here to buy badminton racquets.
sentences.chinese: 現在不要心煩意亂，我們來這裏買羽毛球拍。

sentences.english: I  packed the jackets and  rackets into  packets with the  sacks.
sentences.chinese: 我們用袋子將夾克和球拍打成小包。

sentences.english: Please bring your own badminton rackets.
sentences.chinese: 請您帶上自己的羽毛球拍。

sentences.english: Roddick tossed his racket to the side and the two men shared a hug at the net.
sentences.chinese: 而羅迪克則將球拍扔在一旁，二人隔網相擁。

sentences.english: The goalkeeper bounced the ball twice before kicking it.
sentences.chinese: 守門員把球拍了兩下之後一腳踢出去。

sentences.english: Heck, he could probably beat me with a ping pong paddle.
sentences.chinese: 該死，他即使用乒乓球拍也能打敗我們。

sentences.english: Many of today's touring pros play with customized racquets .
sentences.chinese: 很多當今的網壇名將都自己定製自己的網球拍。

definition: club (golf)/cue (billiards)/also written 球桿|球杆[qiu2 gan1]
to spike the ball (volleyball etc)/to smash (tennis etc)
(ball game) enthusiast (player)/golf buddy (or tennis buddy etc)
to serve the ball/to tee off
